title.rendered: National Publication Features Eldorado Stone’s Bracciano RomaBrick in KitchenAid Ad

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Bracciano RomaBrick is featured in a KitchenAid advertisement in the March 2014 issue of House Beautiful. Utilized on the entire wall, Eldorado Stone’s Bracciano RomaBrick enhances the rustic feel to this modern and urban-inspired kitchen.
